item.title: Democrats divided on whether to shut down government or vote with GOP
item.description: Trump needs Senate Democrats’ votes, but they are still weighing whether to use this rare point of leverage and risk taking blame for a shutdown.

item.title: After pressure from Trump, House Republicans vote to avert shutdown
item.description: The president and other senior administration officials spent the past week pushing hard to get the vote through the narrow House majority.

item.title: House passes funding bill to avert government shutdown, sending it to Senate
item.description: The latest news on President Donald Trump’s administration as the House is expected to vote on a continuing resolution to avert a government shutdown.

item.title: Education Department, with mass layoff, cuts nearly half of its staff
Trump trade war confounds CEOs, deepening economic unease
item.description: Trump addressed business leaders on Tuesday as stock markets continue sliding over concerns about his tariff policies.
